entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:26 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Becoming sunny late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 10.
